description:
This app needs to be able to allow switching from the Default "DARK mode", which is barely readable, to a lighter mode for better visibility! How can you search for what you can not see!

A real pain!
A little sluggish, especially if you pick extra parameters, like "size", but it finds torrents that otherwise might not show up in your search. An excellent tool in my toolbox.
The convenice of finding content in one place. There's no need to search anywhere else! It's an easy to use application! Thanks to the creator(s) of the app!
summary: Torrhunt Search Engine is a one stop shop!

description:
It should be known up front that this app is a 14-day trial version, not something that's very common in the world of Linux. I have no idea what the author(s) is charging or whether there is anything similar that's free or cheaper.

My preliminary test shows it is a capable program and useful. I'm not a total cheapskate and would consider purchasing it after the trial period is the price is reasonable. Otherwise, if you're looking to go with the gratis type programs, you may want to look elsewhere for any similar.
summary: Appears to be very easy to use

description: It does little more than what any of the good torrent clients offer as far as search iunctionality, but there is one key difference - this application and its write up here makes no mention that you have installed a "trial" version that after a short evaluation period requires you to purchase a license. This is truly slimey behaviour and this should be removed from the software center.
Very good software. Excellent example of development.
Works just as expected
Useful. But needs more trackers

description: The app is very straightforward and easy to use .

The app works well, and is a great time saver. However, after the 30 day period the app says it only allows 10 uses per day. This is more than enough for me, but in reality the counter never resets even after multiple days. Fine, I'm happy to pay a small price for the software! But $20 or a subscription? That's absurd for such a simple program.

Fix the daily limit counter, or reduce the purchase price to something reasonable like $5 to make this app worthwhile.
summary: Works well, but the "Trial Version" brings the rating down

description:
Had no problems locating torrents; if anything, I found more torrents than I had anticipated. What's great, though, is that you can filter your search before you search, and again after you receive your results.

Would be great for anyone who hasn't learned how to use regular expressions to search through other services that require setup. This is just plug and play.
